item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>It's snowing here today and due to snow again tomorrow, so most flights delayed or cancelled, New Yprk has reported 12 inches of snow overnight! So will be nice and busy at work, get those snow goggles out people.</p>
item.content:encoded: It’s snowing here today and due to snow again tomorrow, so most flights delayed or cancelled, New Yprk has reported 12 inches of snow overnight! So will be nice and busy at work, get those snow goggles out people.
